description.narrative: UNICEF supported the development of a national strategy on de-institutionalization accompanied by its action plan and communication strategy. UNICEF organized multi-disciplinary trainings for 220 professionals working in the area of alternative care, strengthening their capacity with regard to the implementation of the UN Guidelines on Alternative Care. | Status:Met | As-of Date:07/01/2019
